basics.name: Ayobami Kolade Pase
basics.label: I'm an IT Systems Engineer Specialist focused on Cloud Infrastructure, working as a Cloud Engineer / DevOps Engineer.
basics.x_title: Hi There! Thank you for visiting my Page
basics.summary: I'm Ayobami Pase, a Cloud & DevOps Engineer with hands-on experience building scalable cloud infrastructure using Terraform, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines. I specialize in GCP, AWS, and Kubernetes, and have a passion for automation, monitoring, and system reliability. My work includes deploying production ready workloads, setting up GitHub Actions workflows, and optimizing cloud environments for performance and cost. I build with purpose, making cloud systems faster, safer, and easier to manage.

work.position: Technical Support Engineer / Cloud Infrastructure Engineer – L3
work.summary: Provide advanced support and operations across cloud infrastructure, DevOps, and database optimization environments. Designed secure and scalable infrastructure solutions based on customer and internal project requirements. Performed proactive cloud system administration across AWS, Azure, and GCP platforms. Optimized database operations to improve performance and reduce downtime. Troubleshot critical user-reported issues and built root-cause diagnostics tools for faster resolution. Wrote scripts and automation tools to improve system efficiency and software performance. Documented operational processes and delivered technical support to internal users and stakeholders.

Managed multiple queues of support cases, prioritizing based on severity and user impact. Collaborated with Product Managers and QA teams to address internal technical issues and identify opportunities for functionality improvements. Drove impactful changes across workflows, policies, and tools by working closely with internal support teams and external partners. Owned tasks through resolution or escalation. Investigated and triaged Facebook and Instagram product tooling issues, escalating to Tier 2 Technical Support Engineers for advanced troubleshooting and debugging.

Investigated and responded to inquiries of urgent and sensitive nature in line with established guidelines and policies. Led Master Control Room (MCR) operations and supervised live broadcast teams. Ensured production quality and system security by reviewing workflows and tools including OBS, TriCaster, audio/video mixers, and Adobe Premiere. Investigated urgent issues, dispatched field crews, and transformed key metrics into insights that boosted staff productivity by 50%. Identified domestic and global news trends to strengthen editorial output.

Audited support tickets for SLA compliance and documentation accuracy. Delivered weekly QA reports, coached team members, and led customer service projects focused on quality. Provided hands-on IT support, including PC upgrades, troubleshooting, password resets, and hardware dispatching.

skills.name: Cloud Platforms
skills.x_description: Hands-on with AWS, GCP, and Microsoft Azure — building, deploying, and securing scalable infrastructure across all three.

skills.name: Infrastructure as Code
skills.x_description: Used Terraform and CloudFormation to provision consistent, repeatable cloud environments across dev, stage, and prod.

skills.name: CI/CD Pipelines
skills.x_description: Automated deployments using GitHub Actions, Azure Pipelines, and Jenkins — integrating tests, scans, and delivery.

skills.name: Containers & Kubernetes
skills.x_description: Built and deployed Dockerized apps to AKS, GKE, and EKS clusters; managed scaling, ingress, secrets, and rollouts.

skills.name: Monitoring & Observability
skills.x_description: Implemented dashboards, metrics, and alerts using Datadog, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK, and Azure Monitor.

skills.name: Automation & Scripting
skills.x_description: Built command-line tools and infrastructure scripts using Bash and Python to automate repetitive ops workflows.

skills.name: Ansible
skills.x_description: Designed and implemented a multi-node Ansible automation environment consisting of an Ansible Manager (control node) and multiple Ansible Servers (managed nodes). Configured static IP addressing and hostname resolution, established secure SSH connectivity, and developed playbooks to automate system updates and deploy Apache and MariaDB services.

certificates.name: Preparing for Your Associate Cloud Engineering
